title: Trump picks Brad Parscale to manage 2020 re-election
text:
Trump picks Brad Parscale to manage 2020 re-election 4:19am IST - 01:13 
President Donald Trump on Tuesday named political strategist Brad Parscale as manager of his 2020 presidential re-election campaign, rewarding a digital expert who was critical to Trump’s 2016 victory and who is trusted by the Trump family. Colette Luke has more.
